artist: Painter: John Collet; Engraver: James Caldwall
description: shop interior; at left a large cow in doorway with a man and two dogs trying to remove it from shop; group of women shopping for trimmings for dresses or hats in center; at right two men with black robes and white wigs climbing on counter; third man with child behind him; woman next to him pulling his sword
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and  Inscription
on sheet in black: J. Collet pinx\'t    J. Caldwall sculp\'t / THE UNWELCOME CUSTOMER / London Printed for J. Smith No. 35 Cheapside and R. Sayer No. 53 Fleet Street  as the Act directe 17 August 1772  |  on sheet in pencil: 2-677
title: The Unwelcome Customer
